title: Does SNL have any competition? - Quora

response.answer_text: Sure. Any form of entertainment is a competitor to “Saturday Night Live”. So is sleep. In terms of television programs which have attempted to compete with SNL in its time slot, the most notable was “Mad TV”, which aired from 11PM to Midnight on Saturday nights from 1995 to 2009. Other competition included a pair of shows hosted by Howard Stern in the 1990s, one on local NYC area station WWOR and another syndicated by CBS. However, SNL has never had a serious ratings threat in its timeslot through its 40+ year run.
Going to bed at 11:30. or DVR playback of ‘Castle’ reruns.
